name: outsi
description: OutSi is a Roblox -> Visual Studio Code output replication tool

outsi.rbx.reconnectionDelay.description: The Roblox plugin delay before making the same network request again.

outsi.rbx.resourcePercent.description: The amount of networking resources used up by the Roblox plugin

outsi.rbx.maxLogsInMemory.description: The Roblox plugin maximum stored logs before removing the oldest entry.

outsi.plugin.multiInstanceEnabled.description: Allows 'OutSi' to instantiate multiple vscode terminals for unique studio appearances.

outsi.plugin.autoFocus.description: When an output is received, that specific terminal window will request to be focused.

outsi.plugin.outputLanguageId.description: LanguageId for OutputChannels, the 'LanguageId' will effect how colors are applied.

outsi.plugin.ignoreDuplicateMessages.description: Ignore duplicate roblox messages, behaviour should work the same as the Roblox Output.

outsi.plugin.clearOnRunContextChanged.description: Clear console when the games 'RunContext' has been modified

outsi.plugin.duplicateMessageTag.description: Tag applied before each duplicated message

outsi.plugin.informationTag.description: Tag applied before each information message

outsi.plugin.warningTag.description: Tag applied before each warning message

outsi.plugin.errorTag.description: Tag applied before each error message

outsi.plugin.logTag.description: Tag applied before each default message

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
